description: The Global Salmon Initiative (GSI) is a leadership initiative launched in 2013 by salmon farming companies to enhance sustainability in the industry. Comprising 14 member companies across six countries, GSI focuses on collaboration to tackle common challenges, improve sector performance, and promote responsible practices. Key activities include knowledge sharing, joint research, and sustainability reporting, all aimed at fostering a more sustainable aquaculture sector while engaging CEOs in meaningful dialogue and action.
name: The Global Salmon Initiative (GSI)
